answers.answer: Conditions that cause poor eyesight from childhood and have nystagmus are very difficult to treat.  Unlikely that the eyesight can be improved.  nystagmus can be slightly neutralized and strabismus can be fixed with a complicated surgical procedure but no guarantee that it will stay that way.  Go see a pediatric ophthalmologist.HV
